Method Detail

create

public static void create(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String url,
                          java.lang.String ntdId,
                          int population,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> uzaNames,
                          int ridership,
                          int passenger_miles)
Create a new NtdAgency

Parameters:
name - the agency name
url - the agency's permanent location on the WWW. Not a marketing URL, e.g. WMATA would be http://wmata.com not http://metroopensdoors.com
ntdId - this agency's ID in the National Transit Database.
population - the population of this agency's service area
ridership - the annual unlinked passenger trips of this agency
passenger_miles - the annual passenger miles of this agency

agencies

public static void agencies(DataDumpFormat as)
Return a list of agencies

Parameters:
as - JSON or CSV

agency

public static void agency(long id)
Get the full agency definition for this agency. Hard on the DB.
